featured.text: It takes more time to carve with razor-sharp chisels.
Ice sculptors also use razor-sharp chisels that are specifically designed for cutting ice.

definition.zh_def: 剃刀，一種用於剃除毛髮的工具，通常有一個鋒利的刀片。
definition.en_def: A razor is a tool used for shaving hair, typically featuring a sharp blade.
definition.example: He used a razor to shave his beard.
